section.p: This ZenPack requires Oracle JRE Version 5.0 or higher. Make sure that after you install the JRE you update your PATH such that the java executable works. You can test this using the command:
If the above returns a fully qualified path, then you have successfully installed Java.
If Java is not installed, the which will return a message similar to the following:
To determine which version of Java is installed, run the following command:
section.codeblock: $ java -version java version "1.5.0_16" Java(TM) 2 Runtime Environment, Standard Edition (build 1.5.0_16-b06-284) Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (build 1.5.0_16-133, mixed mode, sharing)

note.p: Oracle Java is required. Other Java implementations do not work.
